mapper.select: select i.id, i.inquiry_category, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_image, i.member_id, i.created_date as inquiryCreatedDate, i.updated_date as inquiryUpdatedDate, m.member_name, ia.inquiry_id, ia.inquiry_answer_content, ia.created_date as answerCreatedDate, ia.updated_date as answerUpdatedDate from tbl_inquiry i left join tbl_inquiry_answer ia on ia.inquiry_id = i.id join tbl_member m on m.id = i.member_id where m.member_status = 'active' and m.member_role = 'buyer' order by m.id desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
